features: REDUCES DULLNESS: Makes grays beautifully silver and brightens up whites by reducing dullness and eliminating brassy tones (Reduces dullness vs. a non-conditioning shampoo)
PURPLE PIGMENT: Maintains your silver strands by neutralizing excess yellow brought on by the environment
HEALTHY STYLE: Gives you healthy-looking hair with a formula that's 100% paraben free and silicone free
LIGHTLY SCENTED: Infuses your locks with notes of fresh, luxurious lotus flower
HOW TO USE: Massage into hair daily, making sure you hit the brassiest areas, and let it sit for 3-5 minutes before rinsing
body.description: Want more silver and less gold? The Pantene Pro-V Silver Expressions Purple Shampoo you love is back with a brand new look. This purple-pigmented cream reduces dullness*, giving you a brighter, more toned look. Purple can color-correct or neutralize excess yellow, bringing back your original tone. After youve finished blaming sunshine, pool time, and even your tap water for adding brassiness, pick up your purple shampoo. It works wonders for gray, white, and silver hair. Lather up daily, or as you see fit, always making sure to leave it in for 3-5 minutes for the best results. Meanwhile, enjoy the luxurious scent of lotus flowers. Now you're on your way to another #greathairday.*Reduces dullness vs. a non-conditioning shampoo.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BRIGHTEN UP THOSE BEAUTIFUL SILVER LOCKS It's back! Care for your silver hair with the same Pantene Pro-V Silver Expressions Shampoo you know and love, now with a fresh new look. This paraben-free and silicone-free purple shampoo brightens and corrects gray, white, and silver hair to bring back its original look and tone. But how? Thanks to its purple pigment, it's able to neutralize the yellow tones your hair absorbs from the world around it.

BRIGHTEN UP THOSE BEAUTIFUL SILVER LOCKS She's embracing her silver, letting her beauty and confidence shine through. Her hair is stunning, radiant, and a reflection of who she is inside and out. You can embrace yours, too. Care for your silver hair with Pantene Pro-V Silver Expressions Shampoo. This ultraviolet, anti-brass cream shampoo brightens and corrects yellow tones in gray, white and silver hair.

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS Q: What hair type is Pantene Pro-V Silver Expressions Shampoo meant for? A: Pantene Pro-V Silver Expressions Shampoo works on all hair types, but is made for white, gray, or silver hair. Q: How do I use Pantene Pro-V Silver Expressions Shampoo? A: Massage the creamy shampoo into your hair taking special care to hit the brassiest areas. Then, let it set in for 3–5 minutes before rinsing. Q: Is Pantene Pro-V Silver Expressions Shampoo safe for daily use? A: Yes, this toning shampoo is free of parabens and silicones and is gentle enough to use every day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this shampoo
reviews.reviewText: I saw this shampoo recommended by a magazine and decided to try it due to the huge savings over a similar shampoo I had been purchasing from my hairdresser. It is the best blue shampoo I have ever used. My hair is shiny and soft and the color is so much brighter than with any other shampoo like this I have ever use. It is foamy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps my hair looking great!!
reviews.reviewText: Great shampoo to keep my hair looking perfect. Helps reduce brassiness of the grey hair. I use it every other day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Did exactly what it was supposed to
reviews.reviewText: It worked well for gray mixtures in hair by making them a silver white against the dark colored hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Especially for silver hair
reviews.reviewText: I like the fragrance. Rich lather. Will probably last me for a couple years because I just use it once a week or less.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have salt & pepper hair so I use half this & half regular shampoo. It’s making my white hair more of a very pretty silver with a nice shine. My now silver locks blend better with my medium brown locks. A very pretty look. I would recommend watching closely to not use too much or too often so it would turn a purple hue. I’ve used it 3 times & so far it’s fine. Will continue to buy & highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t see a change. Tried it many times on grey and nothing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use this for my long grey and dark brown hair. I love how it makes my hair feel and it dies a good job keeping the yellow out. I use this with a purple conditioner too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The first time I used it, I was like, this is really purple! But my hair looks brighter and feels much softer than ever. Highly recommend!

This is the best shampoo for silver hair I've ever used. Leaves your hair manageable, soft and free of flyaways and the best of all - there is no purple residue left on your hair, your hands or under your finger nails. It really brings out the hair's brightness. I've tried other brands and they all leave purple behind. Absolutely love it!
It keeps my salt and pepper gray hair looking shiny, bright with lots of body. Delivery as usual was right on time. Thankyou

My first time using purple shampoo and only decided to use to see if it would change the way my hair feels from other shampoos in the past. I have grey hairs that streak my natural brown and so far loving this shampoo, my hair feels soft and smooth. Will not order again unless I can get in Canada, definitely not worth the price or shipping fees; otherwise great product of Pantene Pro-V.
